website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight joggers are super soft and comfortable and have a flexible, athletic look that can easily be paired with an existing collection of t-shirts.
pros: Ultra comfortable, yet stylish enough to be worn out
cons: Sizes run large, but shrink with washing
Some wearers felt the jersey fabric was too thin

customer_reviews.title: I mean there ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m gonna keep it real with you G these pants are trash, but not like trash trash to where I wouldn’t recommend them just trash enough to where I wouldn’t consider them champion. They feel unremarkably thin that i think my boxers alone have more fabric #inmycalvins. These aren’t your going out with friends type of joggers or your trying to impress the ladies with my name brand pants there more of the someone rang the door bell and i’m naked so let me put something on right quick.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Warning - consumer fraud!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three pants size S, color black. They were supposed to all be 100% cotton. One of the three was 50% cotton, 50% polyester. That's one con. That other con is that the product image is of the 50/50 blend version (though it says "100% cotton"), which is twice as thick as the flimsy 100% cotton version. That's the other con. Overall I would have to recommend that you stay away from this company. I was twice mislead. They should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Dope.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little big in the hip area for me, got a medium. However they’re comfortable and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kii

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I like these pants but i love the price more! Very comfy! I did wish it came in XS. I’m 5’7 130lbs. The small fit but it’s a little baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 5’11” 280lb man
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 5’11” and 280lbs. I’ve had such a hard time buying clothes that fit him. Usually get him stuff that’s too big which originally I puchased this same jogger pants in a 3XL which were too long and too baggy. He kept having to fix the drawstring on those ones. This current size I bought him, 2XL fits perfectly! They actually fit his waste without having to adjust the drawstring but aren’t too tight to be uncomfortable. The length is also perfect. Not super fitted or tight but gives the right amount of looseness around his legs. Also compliments his butt ;)
customer_reviews.author: JBMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Baggy in the thigh Area but fits waist fine, not near as thick as the powerblend
customer_reviews.text: Baggy in the thigh Area but fits waist fine, not near as thick as the powerblend, so won't be as warm but works for sports or exercise and around the house
customer_reviews.author: Oscar T.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the worst purchases I've made. The pants are made of very thin cotton and not at all for winter. It's not warm and it doesn't look like a picture
customer_reviews.author: nir

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He used these pants to work out, I bought size L. He is 6’2 about 180lbs and size L fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously shrunk
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is incapacitated and needed elastic waisted pants to easily put on and take off for rehabilitation. I washed and dried them after confirming that they fit and they shrunk so much it’s embarrassing for me to even put my son in these pants because they are so short. How can a pant shrink this much!! I’d already taken the tags off 5 pairs of them and washed them so I’m just completely out of the money. If you never plan to wash them then buy them...otherwise the minute you wash and dry you can count on them to be a lost cause.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price for a reason
customer_reviews.text: These pants are ok for the price. Crazy thin, weird cut, long ass legs, good stitching, good pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Colin.F.703

customer_reviews.title: Fire retardant
customer_reviews.text: Not jersey knit like first pair. Not thin. Not soft. Not lightweight. It’s a thick, warm, rough, non stretch, cheap fire retardant feeling piece of crap. No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Theres better choices
customer_reviews.text: Thin and didn't fit well for me. The only thing i liked is the string inside as it was looped avoiding the trouble of putting it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: The shape is somehow weird
customer_reviews.text: I like the champion brand very much because it was not expensive compared to other brands. The shape of this pant looks nice, however, it looks weird when I put it on me. And it was really tight for my leg. The fabric was not comfortable at all honestly speaking I don't know why. I will still keep buying the clothes from champion but not this kind of pant for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huang

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size if you order these
customer_reviews.text: Just go a size down if you wear a large get a medium and it will fit great
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Why is it called "Jersey"?? It's not at all.
customer_reviews.text: Generally OK. But why is it called "Jersey"? There's nothing like jersey material here. It's thin and nylon, like women's stockings. So flimsy and thin that they're useless outdoors. And they're so long, they appear to be made for someone 7' tall. So if you're that tall, they should be good. Plus they arrived feeling wet, like they were packed before the dye dried or something... These need to go back...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szava-kovats

customer_reviews.title: comfort is great
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great and very comfortable. they are fitted so they are not loose or baggy like some other athletics pants out there. the only reason its getting a 4 star is because they seam on one side started to become undone. its not major yet but after 4 months of putting some good usage it is somewhat expected, just wish they lasted a bit longer than they have.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband to replace the heavy sweats he typically wears when at home. Working remotely during the pandemic means wearing out your lounge wear and needing different lounge wear as the seasons change. My husband has never wore lightweight 'sweats" before. He was skeptical at first but really like them. He was worn them outdoors, too. They wash well.
customer_reviews.author: EVaz

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected but i turned out liking it anyways
customer_reviews.text: I expected the joggers to be made of a sweatpants material. However, they are actually made of t-shirt material. It is comfortable but not sufficient to wear alone if the temperature is lower than 50 degrees outside. I do recommend these joggers. For the price it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: eman

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four pair of these on sale and I received only one pair so far. All I can say is I love them, they are comfortable and light weight. I bought them to wear around the house, working out, or running errands. I find them to be perfect for all categories. My only complaint is that they aren't built for the winter weather. I would have to wear something underneath for temps below 40. Overall I am satisfied and will definitely buy more champion products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pants for my 96 year old father, who is in rehab with a broken leg. It wasn't easy getting something that he could wear. Not only can he get in and out of them easily, they are comfortable (he IS sitting most of the day) and don't get in the way while he is doing his rehabilitation exercises. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DebbiePearl

customer_reviews.title: Just awful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. I can’t even describe how weird the fit is. Like there was never any actual pattern. Kinda like someone just took some fabric and blindly started sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Susie in Gilbert AZ

customer_reviews.title: Way too small. Very tight/skinny legs.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’11” and 180lbs and normally wear a large. I ordered a large in these pants and they were way too small. I asked my wife if she wanted them (5’6” and 135”) and she tried them on and said they were too small as well. They are incredibly skinny around the lower leg (think super skinny jeans 😳) and then baggy around the bum. Very unflattering.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice & Brady

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 year old son who weighs 137 pounds. He’s 5’1” tall so I knew they’d be too long, all his pants are as he’s a child wearing men’s pants. They are pretty baggy in the thigh so I wish I would have gotten him a small, but that’s on me. Overall they’re nice pants and he says they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Akuchik

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! So comfortable and easy to wear out to run errands. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HLR

customer_reviews.title: Just looks like regular sweatpants not joggers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband in his normal size, and he did not like the style (neither did I). They are very baggy and very high waisted. I also bought the Champion power blend in the same size and color (also on Amazon) and they look great- the fit is slimmer like typical joggers.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and was pleasantly surprised. They fit perfect, lightly loose and snug. Waist feels comfortable, not tight and not loose. I can put my phone, wallet in the pockets and they don’t start to fall down. Color and material are great and love wearing these, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Yohobo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy once you wear them for a bit
customer_reviews.text: When these sweat pants are fresh out of the dryer, they can feel stiff. Generally, they fit smaller than what I would expect, particularly around the thighs and calves. If you have athletic legs, I would suggest sizing up for that reason. However, once you wear them for a bit and stretch them out with your body's movement, they are very comfortable. They are a lighter/thinner fabric, not fleece. Pockets are deep.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rab

customer_reviews.title: Great camo on Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I wanted sweat pants that looked like dress pants on 720p resolution on my teleconferences. These are that camouflage. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product but do not understand why on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but do not understand why on a small size the waist to ankle the length is 42". All my other pants and Joggers are 36". My suggestion to Amazon and the manufacturer is to specify the length of the athletic clothes.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: These are good for summer nice airy and thin
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband to go with some shoes he had.. these are way thinner than expected! But that’s ok! These are summer joggers! They are not too thick even tho they are black they keep cool.. very comfortable and the price was great would order more colors next time
customer_reviews.author: Kai Renee

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice /Standard. Thin cotton pants. Not fuzzy / thick. Sizing runs "normal" (usually buy Men's XL & they fit perfect.) I have had them for over a month & washed them a lot but not in the dryer. No "fuzz" on them yet. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good joggers
customer_reviews.text: These joggers were intended to replace some of my thinner joggers. Fit well and they are comfortable. A tad on the thin side when it comes to lining, but they will do the job. Also got a large given my lower body build. Stronger legs and backside.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: The joggers fit fine, stay up at the waist, tighter around the thighs and cuffed on the bottom. —> The material... wrinkly? All the time, even fresh out of the dryer —> Very thin, feels like they are meant for spring or a cool summer day
customer_reviews.author: Silverlark

customer_reviews.title: Thin but cozy. Not very stylish
customer_reviews.text: The thinnest of the champion jogger sweats I've owned. So in the hierarchy of thickness (thicc to thin) it is Originals, Powerblend, and these. They look kind of like PJ pants but they are cozy. Not the most fashionable but they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: SDyee

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely. Can still squat without tearing at the butt
customer_reviews.text: I’m 76kg and 172cm tall. Fits nicely. Can still squat without tearing at the butt. Material is thin and ok for my tropical climate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great  Gym pants
customer_reviews.text: l like the deep front pockets, l haven't lost anything with the pockets on these pants.. They are real soft and comftable.. l liked them so muchl bought 2 more pair.. l would of bought 3 pair but the Green ones were out of stock..
customer_reviews.author: Wild Will

customer_reviews.title: These pants fit me perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jersey pants. They fit me just right! I dont have big big thighs but I do weigh 240lb. I'm 5'5 in height and an XL fit me perfectly! Even tho the run a lil baggy in the thigh! They are lightweight,(but not too thin) great for spring! I bought 3 pairs! My powerblend (heavier champion sweatpants) are all getting packed in totes for the fall winter!
customer_reviews.author: Da NForceR

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, paper thin, the pant leg bottoms which I thought would be tight but very loose, Big waste of my money. If you go cheap and want cheap buy these, if not buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Fish Geek

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm female and love these pants. They're not as thick as traditional sweatpants, but they're comfy, and I love the cut. They're like sweat pants skinny jeans. I love the pockets and the tapered leg. Great job, Champion!
customer_reviews.author: Sweeti2056

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fits
customer_reviews.text: I take a size small and have a short inseam - these fit perfectly. Nice and snug at the ankles and don't ride up. They've been through a couple of washings and look as new. Seem to be heavier material than standard - very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up/ Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Trying to replace my favorite sweat pants & these were a great alternative! Agree with the sizing...size up. I am 5'7", close to 200 lbs due to large muscle mass particularly in my thighs, so needed the extra room
customer_reviews.author: Michael V Clowdus

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality pants
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone as a gift, expecting it to feel like nice quality sweatpants. I opened up the plastic if came in to make sure they were nice... not. The quality feels so cheap and they aren’t comfortable feeling at all. There is no fleece lining inside like usual sweatpants have and even just the outer fabric feels scratchy and gross. Not good at all. I didn’t even wanna keep it for myself let alone give it as a gift. Returning right now.
customer_reviews.author: JAN T.

customer_reviews.title: Not workout pants, simple pajama pants
customer_reviews.text: These are more like pajama pants than a jogger pant. Like house pants. Also these are not for a man 5'6 or taller. These were too small (size large) and too short for my son (weight 145lbs 6ft) even a larger size wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The texture of material was cheap and very thin. It wasn't thick like a sweat shirt, more like a t-shirt and the tight fit at the ankle was very uncomfortable. The ad description was misleading; at least to me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocker98

customer_reviews.title: Very thin marerial
customer_reviews.text: Did not even try on. As they are t-shirt thin. He wanted joggers, which we thought would be as thick as sweatpants. They aren't so we sent them right back. Probably ok if that's what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After getting 1 pair for Christmas, I ordered another, he was living in them so I guess he likes. Great house pants or running errands on Saturday. He even wears to school, may need to get few more
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Lippard

customer_reviews.title: There Sweats .
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars except for the ankle cuff . Its OK but I prefer a standard cuff . The fit is fine the fabric is soft and the fit is spot on . Its a good buy for the price ...........
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Feigenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. I love working out in these. I’m a guy and I usually wear 36 x 30. The large was perfect for me and my big hips.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: These are fine but they were baggier than I expected and the fabric is really really thin and not soft(not horrible just not good). They also get baggy/weird looking if you put stuff in the pockets beyond just a phone or small wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: The Price Is Right
customer_reviews.text: Considering the low cost, this is a solid performer. Everyone is different so I found the thighs a bit tight for climbing or knew raises but not so tight that they were uncomfortable. The material is rugged and durable but not quite as soft and pliable as some other products. I liked these enough to have bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: You'd pay double the price for these in a Kohls or similar store if you can even find them. Very soft and comfortable. Material is very thin so you're not sweating crazy in em.
customer_reviews.author: mussels.marinara

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pair of pants is made of soft and smooth fabric. It's not too thick. Now that I am working from home all day long, this has become my favorite pair of pants to wear. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lounge pant
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on the shorter side, 5’7” and thicker, especially his thighs— roughly 210lbs and these fit great! Awesome lounging pants and they’re super comfortable and soft. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It fits slightly loose on the waistline for a size M.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and was a bit skeptical on the length of the pants. I’m 5’9” 184 lbs. the length was fine but the waist is slightly loose. Not bad though. I’ll probably order one size smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lighter weight fabric than expected. It’s Jersey fabric like the title says which is T-shirt fabric. I should’ve read that before ordering. If you’re looking for a very lightweight pant these are good to sleep in
customer_reviews.author: Rise

customer_reviews.title: Great joggers
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on these is great. It's thin but not too thin to make you feel cold while also being soft. They definitely don't feel cheap to. They're not too tight but also not too baggy. These are great joggers for a cheap price. I'm 6"4 and the xl are a great length
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: The product runs small. The fabric is thin. These a very light weight pants and do not provide much warmth. These could only be worn in home as they are very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkdiggler

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I'm liked these pants. But one run through the wash and the draw strings came right out. They didn’t go around the whole waist and we’re just for show. So weird. These might just be fake. Buying somewhere else. I got a large, I’m 5’5” and 185 lbs. they’re a little long. Medium would’ve worked better
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Salas

customer_reviews.title: champion jersey jogger
customer_reviews.text: these are made very well,they are a little lighter in materials but still they are very high quality,compaired to normal sweat pant they arer very nice and fit very well
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey ankiel

customer_reviews.title: Not the best pants but not the worst either.
customer_reviews.text: The material is VERY, VERY, thin. The bottom edge of the pocket ripped a week or two after having it. I bought a second pair because in all honesty it is very comfortable but I got the same problem with the pocket having a slight tear. All in all, I’d buy again when it’s on sale again. I didn’t purchase this pants for it’s full price.
customer_reviews.author: Axlrdrgz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The pant legs are a bit snug but I don’t have thin legs. Well made, comfortable elastic waist, lighter weight and deep pockets- all features I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Charlestownchief

customer_reviews.title: Runs small... go up a size or 2
customer_reviews.text: Too tight on the legs. Waist is just fine and the length is good.
customer_reviews.author: yor jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Sweats
customer_reviews.text: These are a light weight fabric. Not really sure what kind. But they are nice for the price. I bought in a black and since have washed them and they have already started to loose the color and faded.
customer_reviews.author: Gladiz Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The Champion sweat pants I bought really fit the bill. No problems with the size in length and waist. A great price and shipping was very fast. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lone Sentry

customer_reviews.title: Size selection
customer_reviews.text: I cheated with size selection, I own a pare already so it was easy to know my size. For those who don’t own a pair you have to really to your research on size
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, champions badge already off.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but very cheaply made. The Champions logo started peeling off after a few years, it was stuck on with weak adhesive. The material isnt great idea. I got it on black Friday for $9, would say it's worth that. Would not buy this for $26 though.
customer_reviews.author: Swati Malhan

customer_reviews.title: This jogger is just okey
customer_reviews.text: This jogger fit me perfectly . But the quality is not so good. If I rate quality 1-10 I would say 6. May be it’s because cheap. But I bought far better champion jogger in Dicks with same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ad

customer_reviews.title: Better than some reviews say
customer_reviews.text: These are inexpensive jersey sweats. Yes they are on the thin side because they are jersey. They're like a heavier t shirt material. My note 10+fits into the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zuber

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these joggers so much. they're so comfy and are perfect for lounging around. i am a female that usually wears a size 8 or size 10 in jeans but I purchased these in an XL incase they shrunk a little the first time washing them. plus I like my sweatpants to be baggy so they fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Konnor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pants but not very well made
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the package they look very old and worn I probably wouldn’t wear these out on the street with any fit but they are very comfortable pants to sleep and lay around in though
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Thin sweatpants
customer_reviews.text: Very slim fitting; these are more like long underwear; very, very thin. Would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Magic

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to name brands; comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to name brands. Material and fit is comfortable. I little looser in the thighs than I am used to, but a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Cruising

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these pants because of the elastic at ankle. These are not fleece, they’re cotton. They wash well. Bought 3 colors.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. They're a little bit thicker than the pair we bought at Macy's! Hes 5'9" 205 lbs, 34 pants and L fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JZorovich

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: What's the point of making them smaller. I'm disappointed, had I known, I would have NOT bought them
customer_reviews.author: Real

customer_reviews.title: Material is scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased three pairs of these for Christmas I’m returning all three of them the material doesn’t have a very nice feel to it and my son didn’t like it
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great, quality very good, material just the right thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Independent Lady

customer_reviews.title: Okay-
customer_reviews.text: The quality is 3/5, they show wear even after 1 wash. Fine for yard work, gym, loose enough to be comfy for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great pants!
customer_reviews.text: Great pants, I’ve ordered my son 3 pairs. We live in the south so they are perfect year round pants. He loves the fit and how comfortable they pants are. I have washed and dried them and they hold up and keep their shape perfectly. Will order more. Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and he LOVES them. He’s a tall, athletic man so we have trouble finding sweats that fit. This style and fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Samame

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like their designs very much. Fits perfectly, I just feel that it might be little too thin.
customer_reviews.author: just a small home reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it supposes to do.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this item which I have purchased several in different colors. It would be better if it is cheaper though.
customer_reviews.author: S-N-D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jogger
customer_reviews.text: Son needed a pair of joggers (it's all he wears <sigh>), he picked these out. Decent price point. Nice quality, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JRE's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these I buy 3-4 pairs at a time, great fit and I enjoy them much more than other brands. Feel nice even after wash and dry
customer_reviews.author: austin wofford

customer_reviews.title: As describe
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. It was a gift, I haven't heard any complaints so I assume all was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: terrilynn

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather, stiff as a board
customer_reviews.text: As the description says, these are lightweight. They are also very stiff. Of course, I haven't washed them yet. Surveying them straight out of the package I'm wondering if I got a different pair than all the people giving 5 star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Indigo

customer_reviews.title: They are great pants.
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves them. He said they are so comfortable. Going to buy more. They did wash very well. A good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and fabric...
customer_reviews.text: My husband found them to be the perfect lightweight athletic pants. He ordered a second pair after trying out the first pair. He is 6'5, about #210, and ordered size large.
customer_reviews.author: John Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great color, light material
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, the weight of the material, great fit, terrific price and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: EDMark

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.text: As a guy I would like a zipper front but, because everything else is so good this lack is NOT a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift. I purchased size small and he is a waste 29 and I think they are true to size. The material isn’t like normal sweat pant material. Its a but thin but i think its perfect for what I wanted. Plus they have strings in the waist to tie, to make tighter if needed
customer_reviews.author: malia

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Love the fit and the comfort!! I ordered another set in a different color after wearing the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these( grey and black) for my husband for Christmas and they fit him perfectly! My husband is a about 5'11 and 200lbs and the large fit great. The quality and sizing is on point!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F

customer_reviews.title: Thin pants
customer_reviews.text: It is way too thin for me, so I returned it. It’s good for summer, but definitely not my style.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight and breathable sweatpants, that don’t look too thin! Already washed and had no problems with fraying
customer_reviews.author: The Browns

customer_reviews.title: Im ordering more!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed for work. They aren't to thick and they aren't to thin. Plus the are light weight. They are the basic design so nothing special so expect the basic. They are veryyyyyyy comfortable. They don't fit to loose or to tight, they fit just right. they fall right at my ankle. I love them will be buying again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: True to size, a nice medium weight pant. Not too thick and not too thin. Washes up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fayer

customer_reviews.title: leg cuff is like a sleeve cuff
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the sleeve type cuff. When did that change take place? looks weird, feels weird......
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two I liked them so much. Good for the price. Not fleeced line so the aren’t too hot.
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Already a hole
customer_reviews.text: Got them yesterday. Wore them today. Hole in the side. They fit loosely. Very comfortable. Was going to order more until I saw the hole in the side.
customer_reviews.author: mallory

product_meta.title: Champion Jersey Jogger
product_meta.description: The Champion jogger jersey pant is lightweight jersey at its best - the ultimate in comfort and durability.
feature_bullets: 1 oz, 100% Cotton; oxford: 90% cotton/10% black polyester; granite: 60% cotton/40% polyester
Cotton jersey pants with Sport Comfort waistband are perfect year-round warm-ups
Internal quick cord waistband for adjustable
fit Comfortable athletic fit Handy side pockets
